text: (Napiye!) Kalala (takappan, tay, pattan, pillai, peran akiya varicukal illata cottu) parriya markkak kattalaiyai avarkal um'mitam ketkirarkal. Nir kurum; allah unkalukku (ivvaru) kattalaiyitukiran;. Oru manitan irantuvittal, avanukku makkal illamaliruntu oru cakotari mattum iruntal, avalukku avan vittuc cenratiliruntu cari pati panku untu. Itarku maraka oru pen irantu vittal, avalukku makkal yarum illatiruntal, (avalutaiya cakotaranakiya) avan aval cottu mulumaikkum varicu avan;. Iru cakotarikal iruntal avan vittuc cenra cottil munril irantu pakattai ataivarkal;. Avalukku utan pirantavarkal ankalum penkalumaka iruntal, irantu penkalukkuriya pakam or anukku untu - ninkal vali tavaramal iruppatarkakave allah unkalukku (ivvitikalai) vilakki vaikkiran;. Allah yavarraiyum nanku arintavanaka irukkinran
